amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2024 by $1,553,000,000 to match FY22 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 314 (Roll no. 554).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 100 - 314 (Roll no. 554).
